glsa.title: SQLite: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities were found in SQLite, the worst of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: SQLite is a C library that implements an SQL database engine.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in SQLite. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All sqlite users should upgrade to the latest version:

references.uri: Two invalid read errors / heap overflows in SQLite (TFPA 006/2015)
